title: Ambient Video Game Music - Lava Fields 3
description: Dive into the raw, elemental power of nature with "Ambience - Lava Fields 3," an evocative collection of 10 ambient soundscapes that capture the fierce beauty of Iceland's lava fields.
longDescription:
Dive into the raw, elemental power of nature with "Ambience - Lava Fields 3," an evocative collection of 10 ambient soundscapes that capture the fierce beauty of Iceland's lava fields. For just $19.99, this album offers game developers and content creators the unique opportunity to integrate the authentic sounds of bubbling lava, the harsh gusts of wind sweeping across rocky expanses, and the deep, resonant creaks and crunches of the earth's tectonic movements into their projects.


Each track is a carefully curated journey through the untamed wilderness of Iceland's volcanic landscapes, where the earth speaks in whispers of heat and movement. "Ambience - Lava Fields 3" brings to life the dynamic environment of lava fields, where the ground itself is alive with the flow of molten rock and the air trembles with the energy of the earth's raw power.


This collection is an essential tool for those looking to add depth and intensity to their creative works. Whether setting the scene for an epic adventure through alien terrains, heightening the suspense in a story of survival and exploration, or simply providing a backdrop for moments of reflection in a vast, awe-inspiring setting, "Ambience - Lava Fields 3" delivers unparalleled authenticity and atmosphere.


Priced at $19.99, "Ambience - Lava Fields 3" is more than just an album; it's a gateway to exploring the primal forces of nature in your projects. Immerse your audience in the sounds of Iceland's lava fields and elevate your creative endeavors with this rich, immersive sonic palette.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!
